instructions: Combine the mango, banana, buttermilk, sugar, vanilla and cardamom in a blender and blend until smooth. Divide among 4 glasses and serve.
ingredients: 1 tablespoon sugar or honey, plus more if mango isn't super sweet
title: Mango-Cardamom Buttermilk Smoothie

instructions: Purée all ingredients in a blender until smooth. Pour into tall glass and serve immediately.;
ingredients: 1 cup (250 ml) green California grapes, rinsed
1/2 cup (125 ml) diced pineapple (use fresh, canned or frozen)
1 tsp (5 ml) sweetened green tea powder (optional)
title: Grape and Green Tea Smoothie

instructions:
Combine all ingredients together in a blender and pulse until ice is incorporated. Then puree until smooth.
Copyright © 2004 Television Food Network, G.P., All Rights Reserved.
ingredients: 1 Granny Smith apple, cored, skin on
title: Apple and Avocado Smoothie

instructions: Process all ingredients in a blender at high speed until smooth. Pour pooch smoothies into small bowls and freeze. Remove from the freezer, set on the floor and let your pooch lick the treat.
ingredients: 1 cup blackberries or raspberries or 5 large, hulled strawberries
title: Power Pooch Smoothies

instructions:
1.Place all ingredients into the Vitamix container in the order listed and secure lid.
2.Select Variable 1.
3.Turn machine on and slowly increase speed to Variable 10, then to High.
4.Blend for 1 minute or until desired consistency is reached. Serve immediately.
ingredients: 4 ounces (113 g) low fat vanilla yogurt or vanilla soy milk
2 cups (310 g) fresh, ripe pineapple, with core (or a 2-inch thick slice)
1 celery stalk (7-inch stalk, 37 g, 1.3 oz), halved or about 1/3 cup chopped
2 cups (60 g) spinach leaves, gently packed
Sweetener to taste if pineapple is a bit tart
title: Emerald Smoothie

instructions: Place all ingredients in a blender and blend until smooth. Pour into wine glasses and serve.
ingredients: 1 tablespoon hazelnut flavored or almond flavored syrup
title: Cafe du Monde Smoothie

instructions: In a blender process six coffee cubes, frozen yogurt, chocolate syrup, Irish cream and milk until smooth. Serve in a tall glass.
title: Irish Mocha Smoothie

instructions: Add a handful of ice cubes to a food processor and process slightly. Add mangoes, frozen yogurt, and a splash of orange juice. Process until smooth. Serve.
title: Orange Mango Smoothie

instructions:
Pinch ground cinnamon, plus more for garnish
Put the pumpkin puree, yogurt, ice cubes, maple syrup, vinegar, ginger and cinnamon into a blender. Blend until very smooth. Add 1 to 2 tablespoons of water if needed to adjust consistency. Pour into a glass and dust with cinnamon.
ingredients: 1/2-inch piece fresh ginger, peeled and grated
title: Pumpkin-Ginger Smoothie

instructions: Combine all the ingredients in a blender and blend for 1 minute. Serve immediately. Makes 2 1/3 cups of smoothie.
ingredients: 1/2 cup vanilla or honey Greek yogurt
title: Breakfast-to-Go Grape Smoothie

instructions: Combine all ingredients together in a blender and puree until smooth.
title: Mixed Berries and Banana Smoothie

instructions: In a blender, combine peaches, ice cream, ice cubes, rum and schnapps and blend until smooth. Pour into 4 frozen glasses.
title: Peach Smoothie

instructions: Place all ingredients in a blender. Puree until well combined and smooth. Serve in a tall old fashion glass, and garnish with a sprig of basil.;
ingredients: 2 grapefruits, peeled and white pith removed
2 oranges, peeled and white pith removed
title: Chilled Citrus Smoothie

instructions: Add all ingredients to blender. Blend until smooth. If you'd like an iced smoothie, blend and then add ice to desired consistency.
title: Fresh Fruit Smoothie

instructions: Put the banana, yogurt, dates and nutmeg into a blender. Blend on high until the mixture is mostly smooth, about 1 minute. Add the ice cubes and blend until completely smooth. Add 1 to 2 tablespoons of cold water if needed to adjust consistency.
title: Banana Nog Smoothie

instructions: Add the orange, mango, pineapple, wine, honey and crushed ice to a blender and puree until smooth and creamy. Pour into white wine goblets and serve.
ingredients: 2 cups very cold fruity white wine
title: Wine Smoothies

instructions: Add the apple juice, Greek yogurt, blueberries, mangos, pineapple and banana to a blender. Blend until smooth. Pour into glasses and garnish with a fun straw.
ingredients: 1 banana, peeled and cut into chunks
title: Jack's Purple Smoothie

instructions:
Blend the coconut milk, chia seeds, honey, cinnamon, ginger, vanilla, oranges and 3 ice cubes in a blender on low speed until everything begins to combine. Raise the setting to high and blend until everything is well combined and the smoothie begins to have a creamy consistency. Taste; if you like it colder, add more ice cubes and blend until smooth.
Pour into two glasses and garnish with a sprinkle of cinnamon and chia seeds if using.
ingredients: 1 tablespoon chia seeds, plus more for garnish, optional
1 teaspoon cinnamon, plus more for garnish, optional
1 teaspoon chopped peeled gingerroot (about one 1/2-inch piece)
title: Orange-Spice Chia Smoothie

instructions: Add the spinach, almond milk, chia seeds, banana and avocado to the pitcher of a blender and blend. Depending on the power of the appliance, you may need to stop it, stir the ingredients and then continue blending. If the consistency is too thin, blend in some ice cubes. Transfer to a bowl, add toppings, and enjoy with a spoon!
title: Green Smoothie Bowl

instructions: Place everything in a blender and puree until smooth.;
title: Blueberry Power Smoothie

instructions:
For the chicken salad: Bring 4 cups water to a boil in a large saucepan. Turn off the heat, add the tea bags and steep for 5 minutes.
Remove the tea bags and bring back to a rolling boil. Stir in 1/2 teaspoon salt and the chicken. Cover, reduce the heat to low and poach until fully cooked, about 7 minutes. Drain and transfer the chicken to a small bowl to cool to room temperature.
Stir together the onions, 3 tablespoons of the yogurt, the mayonnaise, basil, tarragon, vinegar and 1/2 teaspoon salt in a large bowl. Stir in the cooled chicken, cover and refrigerate for at least 1 hour to allow the flavors to combine. (Can be made and refrigerated a day ahead.)
Toast the almonds in a dry skillet over medium heat, stirring constantly, until golden, 3 to 4 minutes.
Divide the chicken among four of the bread slices. Top each with the toasted almonds, salad greens and the remaining bread slices. Cut in half.
For the smoothies: Combine the apple juice, 1 cup ice, lime juice, basil, apples and avocado together in a blender, and pulse until the ice is incorporated. Then puree until smooth. Divide evenly among four glasses.
Serve each sandwich with a smoothie and 1/2 cup of Greek yogurt topped with 1 tablespoon of raspberry jam.
ingredients: Two 6-ounce boneless, skinless chicken breasts, cut into small bite-size cubes
2 cups plus 3 tablespoons fat-free plain Greek yogurt
1 cup packed mixed baby salad greens
6 sprigs fresh basil or mint leaves
2 Granny Smith apples, cored, skin on and chopped
title: Herbal Chicken Sandwiches with Apple-Avocado Smoothie

instructions:
Stand one of the mangos upright with the narrow end facing you. Slice off the 'cheeks' on either side of the stone and slice these in half lengthwise. Cut around the stone to take off as much flesh as possible, capturing all the running juices in a bowl.
Remove the skin by peeling or cutting the fruit carefully off it. Repeat with the other mango. Discard the skin and puree the flesh and juice in a food processor or blender.
Add the milk and sugar, and combine until it becomes a thick smooth mass. Transfer the liquid to a pitcher and chill the mixture until ready to drink. Add the ice cubes to the pitcher and serve straight from the refrigerator. A little goes a long way, so serve in small glasses.
ingredients: 2 Indian Alphonso mango or canned pureed mangos
1 1/2 to 2 tablespoons sugar, or to taste, according to the size and sweetness of the mangos
title: Mango Smoothie

instructions:
Watch how to make this recipe.
For the banana-avocado smoothie base: Put the almond milk, flax seeds, honey, banana and avocado in a blender. Blend on high until the mixture is mostly smooth, about 1 minute. Add the ice cubes and blend until completely smooth.
To make it pink, yellow, green or purple: Add the color additions and blend again until completely smooth.
title: Rainbow Smoothie

instructions: Combine the blackberries, acai puree, banana, cocoa powder, coconut butter if using, honey, vanilla and almond milk in a blender and puree until completely smooth. The mixture is extremely thick and you may need to stop the blender and scrape down the sides to get it moving. Pour into 2 glasses and garnish with cacao nibs if using.
ingredients: Two 3.5-ounce packs frozen unsweetened acai puree, broken into pieces
1 frozen banana, peeled and broken into pieces
2 tablespoons raw cacao powder or unsweetened cocoa powder
1 tablespoon coconut butter or coconut oil, optional
title: Acai, Blackberry and Cacao Smoothie

instructions:
Watch how to make this recipe.
Combine the soy milk, juice, banana, strawberries, blueberries, and the peaches in the carafe of a blender. Cover and refrigerate overnight or up to 8 hours.
In the morning, or when the fruit is partially thawed, put the carafe on the base of the blender, start at the lowest speed and slowly accelerate to medium, until you achieve a vortex. Blend on medium for 1 minute. Increase the speed to high and blend for an additional minute. Serve immediately.
ingredients: 4 ounces acai, grape, or pomegranate juice
title: Buff Smoothie

instructions:
Put the chocolate and heavy cream in a small bowl set over--not in!--simmering water, and stir until the chocolate melts. Remove from the heat and let cool for 5 minutes.
Put half of the melted chocolate mixture into a blender along with the bananas, yogurt, milk and peanut butter. Blend until smooth and frothy, about 2 minutes.
Drizzle the remaining melted chocolate in the bottom and down the sides of two large glasses. Fill each glass with the smoothie and serve immediately.
ingredients: 2 large bananas, peeled, chopped and frozen
2 heaping tablespoons smooth peanut butter, such as Skippy
title: Chocolate-Peanut Butter Swirl Smoothie

instructions:
Watch how to make this recipe.
Combine the milk, yogurt, vanilla, banana, papaya and ice cubes in a blender and blend until smooth. Pour into a large glass.
ingredients: 1 small ripe banana, peeled and sliced
1/2 large, ripe papaya, peeled, seeded and chopped
title: Papaya-Banana Smoothie

instructions: In a blender, combine frozen strawberries, orange juice, and orange zest. Pulse to coarsely chop. Add orange liqueur, frozen yogurt, and sugar. Continue to blend until smooth and frothy. Divide between 4 small glasses and garnish with an orange wedge and serve.
ingredients: 8 large strawberries, trimmed, halved, and frozen
1 cup vanilla frozen yogurt or ice cream
1 tablespoon sugar, or more if berries are not very sweet
title: Spiked Weekend Smoothie

instructions:
Watch how to make this recipe.
Place all ingredients in a blender and blend until fully combined. Refrigerate until chilled. Pour into a tall glass and serve chilled.
title: Mango Smoothie

instructions: Put the blueberries, grapes, strawberries, banana, yogurt, milk, honey and ice into blender and blitz until smooth. Serve immediately.
ingredients: 2 tablespoons honey, or more to taste
title: Purple Monster Smoothie

instructions: In the pitcher of a blender, add the almond milk, almond butter, chia seeds, cocoa powder if using, honey, ice cubes and banana slices, and blend until smooth. Garnish with the sliced almonds to serve.
ingredients: 1 banana, cut into 1-inch pieces and frozen
title: Chocolate Almond Smoothie

instructions: Peel the mango and cut all of the fruit away from the seed. Wash the strawberries and cut off the stems. Place the fruit into a blender along with the remaining ingredients and blend till smooth, pureed and creamy. Sereve in chilled glasses.;
ingredients: 2 tablespoons brewer's yeast (available in health food stores)
title: Mango (or Papaya) Strawberry Fruit Smoothie

instructions: Place figs, rice, soy milk, cinnamon, ice and molasses in a blender. Blend until smooth. Pour into a glass and garnish with whole strawberry.;
title: Fig and Rice Smoothie

instructions:
Watch how to make this recipe.
Put all ingredients into a blender and blend until smooth.
Per Serving: Calories 240; Total Fat 0 g; (Sat Fat 0 g, Mono Fat 0 g, Poly Fat 0 g) ; Protein 12 g; Carb 49 g; Fiber 3 g; Cholesterol 5 mg; Sodium 150 mg Excellent source of: Protein, Vitamin C, Calcium, Good source of: Iodine, Phosphorus, Fiber, Vitamin A, Riboflavin
ingredients: 1/2 cup nonfat or 1 percent lowfat milk
1 tablespoon honey, plus more to taste
title: Peach Pie Smoothie

instructions: Combine the almond milk, oats, chocolate-hazelnut spread, espresso powder, banana and ice in a blender. Blend on high until completely blended and smooth. Pour and serve immediately.
title: Chocolate-Hazelnut Smoothie

instructions: In the pitcher of a blender add 1 cup water, the milk, honey, ice cubes and avocados, and blend until smooth. Taste may vary based on the sweetness of the avocados; add additional honey if needed. Stir in the chia seeds, then pour into glasses and serve.
ingredients: 1 tablespoon honey, plus more if needed
title: Avocado Stressbuster Smoothie

instructions: Blend the almond milk, kale, almond butter, banana, dates if using and 3 ice cubes in a blender on low speed until everything begins to combine. Raise the setting to high and blend until everything is well combined and the smoothie begins to have a creamy consistency. Taste; if you like it colder, add more ice cubes and continue to blend until smooth.
ingredients: 1 packed cup or 1 big handful kale
2 tablespoons almond butter or peanut butter
1 large banana, preferably frozen (peel before freezing)
title: Green Dream Smoothie

instructions: Put all of the ingredients into a blender and blend until smooth.
title: Peanut Butter Split Smoothie

instructions: Put the cucumber, buttermilk, honey if using and lime juice into a blender. Blend on high until smooth. Add half of the frozen watermelon and blend until almost completely smooth, turning off the blender and pushing down on the ingredients with a spatula or wooden spoon as needed to help the blending process. Add the remaining frozen watermelon and continue to blend until smooth. Add 1 to 2 tablespoons of water if needed to adjust consistency. Pour into a glass and garnish with a cucumber slice.
ingredients: One 2-inch piece English cucumber, peeled and roughly chopped (about 1/2 cup), plus one slice reserved for garnish
title: Watermelon-and-Cucumber Smoothie

instructions:
Place the juice and Benefiber® in a blender and blend 30 seconds. Add the banana and blend until smooth. Blend in the frozen fruit.
Each serving provides 8.7 g of fiber.
*Read product label before recipe preparation.
ingredients: 1 cup orange juice or other fruit juice
2 cups frozen fruit of your choice - peaches, berries, melon, or whatever you have
title: Frosty Fruit Smoothie

instructions:
In a small bowl, stir together the oats and 1/4 cup hot water, and rest for 5 minutes.
In the pitcher of a blender, add the oat mixture, the cherries, yogurt, 2 tablespoons cold water, the honey, almond extract and a pinch of salt. Blend on high speed until very smooth. Pour into a glass and serve immediately.
title: Healthy Cherry Almond Oatmeal Smoothie

instructions: Place the melon chunks in a blender, add the mint leaves and grated ginger, and process until smooth. Add yogurt. Serve thoroughly chilled.;
ingredients: 1/8 cup loosely packed fresh mint leaves
title: Mixed Melon Smoothie

instructions: Place milk, Carnation® Breakfast Essentials™ Drink, and banana in blender. While it's blending, add frozen orange juice, honey and ice. Blend until smooth. Makes 1 large smoothie or 2 if you feel like sharing!
ingredients: 1 packet Classic French Vanilla Flavor Carnation® Breakfast Essentials™ Complete Nutritional Drink
1 to 2 tablespoons frozen concentrated orange juice
title: Sunrise Surprise Smoothie

instructions:
Steep the tea bag for 2 minutes in the water. Remove the bag and allow the tea to cool. Pour the tea into an ice cube tray and freeze until solid, at least 2 hours.
Put the strawberries, milk, lime juice, honey and mint into a blender and blend until almost smooth. Add the green tea ice cubes and continue to blend until very smooth. Garnish with the sliced strawberry
ingredients: 1 cup fresh strawberries, halved, plus 1 sliced strawberry for garnish
title: Strawberry-Green Tea Smoothie

instructions: Place everything in a blender and pulse until smooth.
ingredients: 1 chile de arbol, toasted and stemmed
title: Fresh Fruit Smoothie with a Kick

instructions:
Watch how to make this recipe.
In a blender, add about half the soy milk and the spinach. Puree until the spinach dissolves, about 30 seconds. Add the remaining soy milk, banana chunks, vanilla extract, flax seed, and chocolate syrup, if using, and blend until the mixture reaches a smooth consistency, another 30 seconds. Divide mixture between two chilled glasses with straws.
Cook's Note: If the smoothie is looking a little too green from the spinach, add a squeeze of chocolate syrup to enhance the smoothie's brown color.
ingredients: 2 cups chilled sweetened chocolate soy milk
3/4 cup frozen banana chunks (about 2 medium), peeled
title: Chocolate and Banana Smoothie

instructions: Place all the ingredients in a blender and process until smooth.
ingredients: 1 medium banana or 1/2 cup frozen strawberries
title: Fruit Smoothie

instructions:
Peel the kiwis and cut them into chunks.
Put the kiwi chunks, strawberries, yogurt, milk and honey into a blender container. The blender is sharp inside. Watch your fingers!
Cover the blender with the lid and blend on high speed until the mixture is smooth. Turn the blender off and on or pulse, if needed, to break up the strawberries.
Pour into four glasses and serve with straws.
title: Strawberry Kiwi Smoothie

instructions: Add the strawberries, pineapple, milk, baby spinach, yogurt, bananas, avocado and ice to a blender and blend until smooth, thick and creamy. Pour into 4 glasses and garnish with sliced strawberries.
ingredients: 2 cups strawberries, plus sliced strawberries, for garnish
1/2 cup skim milk or almond milk
title: Fruit Smoothie

instructions: In a blender, combine 2 cups orange juice and 1/4 cup instant oatmeal; let sit 10 minutes. Add 2 cups ice, 1 cup vanilla yogurt and 1/2 teaspoon vanilla extract; puree until smooth.
title: Orange-Vanilla Smoothies

instructions: Combine all ingredients together in a blender and puree until smooth.
title: Silken Smoothie

instructions:
Watch how to make this recipe.
Add all ingredients to blender and puree until smooth. Pour into glasses and serve immediately.
ingredients: 2 small bananas, peeled, cut into 2-inch pieces, and frozen
6 ounces vanilla yogurt, preferably whole milk
title: Triple Berry Banana Yogurt Smoothie

instructions:
Watch how to make this recipe.
Combine all ingredients in a blender. Blend until smooth. Divide among glasses.
ingredients: 1-ounce sugar-free, fat-free vanilla pudding mix (recommended: Jell-o)
1 (4-ounce) orange cream yogurt (recommended: Yoplait Orange Creme)
title: Orange Smoothie

instructions:
Watch how to make this recipe.
Combine the raspberries, banana, orange juice, milk, yogurt, honey and ice in a blender and process until smooth and serve.
title: Banana Raspberry Smoothies

instructions:
Watch how to make this recipe.
Put the melon, spinach, grapes, orange juice, bananas, yogurt, almond butter and dates in the carafe of a blender and puree until smooth.
Fill an ice pop mold with the smoothie mix, add the sticks and freeze overnight.
title: Smoothie on a Stick

instructions: Combine the orange juice, lime juice, strawberries, and banana in a blender and process until smooth. Refrigerate until cold.
ingredients: 1 1/2 cups freshly squeezed orange juice (4 oranges)
1 cup strawberries, tops removed, and cut in 1/2
title: Orange Banana Smoothie

instructions:
In a large glass, combine soymilk, pudding mix, and powdered drink mix. Stir thoroughly, until mostly dissolved. Transfer to a blender. Add all remaining ingredients except whipped topping.
Blend at high speed until thoroughly mixed. If needed, remove blender from the base, stir mixture, and blend again. Pour into the large glass and top with whipped topping. Enjoy!!
ingredients: 1 tablespoon sugar-free fat-free banana-flavored instant pudding mix (recommended: Jell-O)
Half a (2-serving) packet (about 1/2 teaspoon) sugar-free strawberry powered drink mix
Half a medium banana, sliced into coins and frozen
1 1/2 cups crushed ice or 8 to 12 ice cubes
2 tablespoons fat-free whipped topping (from an aerosol canister)
title: Banana-Berry Cloud Smoothie

instructions: Pour ingredients into a blender and blend until smooth.;
ingredients: 1 cup fresh peaches, sliced, partially frozen
title: Raspberry Peach Smoothie

instructions: Put the mango chunks, peach slices, yogurt, carrots, orange juice, pineapple chunks, honey and banana in a blender and blend until everything's totally smooth.
title: Orange Resolution Smoothies

instructions: In a blender, combine strawberries, blueberries, banana, and pineapple until smooth. Add tofu and ice cubes and liquefy. Serve immediately.
title: Tutti Frutti Smoothie

instructions: In a blender, combine pumpkin, soy milk, yogurt, pumpkin spice, juice of half a lemon, and 1 dash of vanilla extract. Blend together until smooth, and begin adding the ice while continuing to blend. When mixture is thick and creamy, stop and hold in refrigerator at least 30 minutes. Cut off the top 1/3 of the orange. Remove the inside of the orange and reserve the rind. In a medium mixing bowl, combine cream, powdered sugar, and the remaining vanilla extract; then whip on high until a stiff peak forms. Transfer the smoothie into the orange rind, and garnish with whipped cream and cinnamon sticks.
ingredients: 1 cup low-fat whipping cream, plus garnish
title: Pumpkin Smoothie

instructions: Blend 15 to 20 seconds, use a spatula to remove the thick and creamy smoothie from the blender.
ingredients: Fusion Boosters (ginseng, bee pollen, multivitimin, ginko biloba, lecithin, and/or soy protein)
title: Strawberry Banana Smoothie

instructions:
In a blender, combine melon, yogurt, and apple juice concentrate. Blend until smooth. With blender running, add ice until frothy.
Pour into 2 (16-ounce) glasses and garnish with sliced melon.
ingredients: 2 tablespoons apple juice, from frozen concentrate
title: Honeydew Smoothie

instructions:
Pour nectar into blender. Add all remaining ingredients. Blend on high for 30 seconds to 1 minute or until smooth.
To make a smoothie cocktail, add 3 ounces vanilla vodka, if desired.
title: Peach-Mango Smoothie

instructions: Combine all the ingredients, except the honey, in a blender and blend until smooth. Honey maybe added, if you like it sweeter. Serve immediately in chilled glasses.
title: Berry Banana Smoothie

instructions: Add the berries, banana, milk and yogurt. Depending on the power of your appliance, you may need to stop it, stir the ingredients and then continue blending. If the consistency is too thin, blend in some ice cubes. Transfer to a bowl, add toppings, and enjoy with a spoon!
title: Berry-licious Smoothie Bowl

instructions: Put the apple, yogurt, peanuts, 2 tablespoons cold water and honey into a blender. Blend on high until the mixture is mostly smooth, about 1 minute. Add the ice cubes and blend until completely smooth. Add 1 to 2 tablespoons more water if needed to adjust consistency.
ingredients: 1 Gala or pink lady apple, cored and cut into chunks
title: Apple-Nut Smoothie

instructions:
Watch how to make this recipe.
Combine the bananas, cherries, yogurt, honey, ginger and ice cubes in a blender, and puree until smooth.
title: Cherry Banana Smoothie

instructions: Place ice, passion fruit nectar, vodka, half-and-half, Cointreau, orange juice, and coconut cream, if using, in a blender. Blend until smooth. Adjust consistency by adding more ice or juice as needed. Garnish with passion fruit seeds, and serve immediately.;
ingredients: Fresh passion fruit seeds, for garnish
title: Passion Fruit Vodka Smoothie

instructions: To a blender, add the ice, yogurt and pomegranate martini. Blend until smooth. Pour into chilled martini glasses and garnish with raspberries.
title: Pomegranate Smoothie

instructions:
Preheat oven to 375 degrees F. Put the peaches and blackberries on a baking sheet and roast, turning once, until very soft and caramelized, about 30 minutes. Remove to a plate and let cool. The fruit can be roasted a day ahead of time and stored in a container with a tight-fitting lid for up to 1 day.
Combine the fruit, yogurt, peach nectar, vanilla and 1 cup ice cubes in a blender and blend until smooth. Divide among 2 large glasses.
title: Roasted Peach and Blackberry Smoothie

instructions: Combine the milk, oats, yogurt, apple, cinnamon and 3 ice cubes in a blender, and blend until smooth and creamy, about 1 minute.
ingredients: 1/2 medium apple, cored and roughly chopped
title: Apple and Cinnamon Breakfast Smoothie

instructions:
Watch how to make this recipe.
Combine mango, yogurt, nectar, rum and a few cups of crushed ice in a blender and blend until smooth and frothy. Sweeten with simple syrup, if needed. Divide among 4 glasses and serve.
ingredients: 2 ripe mangoes, peeled, pitted and chopped
2 to 4 tablespoons simple syrup, depending on sweetness of mangoes
title: Mango-Yogurt-White Rum Smoothie

instructions: Add the almond milk, blueberries, almonds, yogurt, chia seeds and flaxseeds to a blender and blend until smooth.
title: Get Up and Go Smoothie

instructions: In half-batches, combine all ingredients in blender and blend on high until smooth. The frozen fruits will make the smoothies extra cold and frothy, too!
ingredients: 2 cups frozen sliced strawberries, slightly defrosted in microwave, just to break up the block a bit
2 cups sliced frozen peaches, slightly defrosted in microwave, just to break up the block a bit
2 cups strawberry banana lowfat custard yogurt
title: Frothy-Chilly Fruit Smoothies

instructions:
In a small saucepan, bring the sugar and water to a boil over medium-high heat. Simmer, stirring occasionally, until the sugar has dissolved, about 5 minutes. Cool for 20 minutes.
Pour the cooled syrup into a blender. Add the yogurt, orange juice, bananas, orange zest, vanilla extract, and ice. Blend until the mixture is smooth. Pour into glasses and serve.
ingredients: 2 tablespoons grated orange zest (from 1 large orange)
title: Citrus Cream Smoothie

instructions: Combine the almond milk, yogurt, peanut butter, protein powder and banana in a blender. Blend until smooth. Serve immediately.
title: Peanut Butter and Banana Smoothie

instructions: In a blender, blend all ingredients until smooth.
ingredients: 1 small banana, peeled and cut into chunks
title: Island Fruit Smoothie

instructions: Combine the kale, yogurt, flaxseed, if using, bananas, apple and orange in a blender along with 12 ice cubes. Pulse a few times, then puree until smooth, scraping down the sides as necessary. Divide among 4 glasses and serve.
ingredients: 1 Granny Smith apple, cored and chopped
title: Mean Green Smoothies

instructions:
Make the smoothies: Combine the yogurt, 1 1/2 cups ice, carrots, 2 tablespoons of the maple syrup and the ginger in a blender and blend until smooth. Divide among four glasses and refrigerate until ready to serve.
Make the sauce: Combine the blueberries and the remaining 3 tablespoons of maple syrup in a small microwave-safe bowl. Cover with plastic wrap and microwave until the blueberries pop, about 2 minutes. Set aside.
Preheat a waffle iron and lightly coat with the nonstick cooking spray. Whisk together the milk, egg, cinnamon and 1/8 teaspoon salt in a baking dish. Soak a piece of bread, on each side, for a few seconds. Place on the waffle iron, close and cook until golden brown, 3 to 4 minutes. Remove and keep warm on a plate covered in foil, repeat with the remaining bread.
Divide the waffles and blueberry sauce evenly among four plates, sprinkle with almonds. Serve with the smoothies.
title: Waffled Blueberry French Toast with a Carrot-Ginger Smoothie

instructions:
Combine the water, honey and vanilla bean pod in a small saucepan over low heat. Simmer for 7 to 9 minutes, stirring occasionally, to allow the vanilla to infuse into the honey. Remove the vanilla pod and allow the mixture to cool completely, about 10 to 15 minutes.
In a blender, combine some of the vanilla honey with the yogurt, mint and 1/2 tray of frozen coconut water cubes, or more for desired consistency. Puree until smooth, then pour into glasses and garnish with a sprig of fresh mint. Serve immediately.
ingredients: 1 teaspoon torn fresh mint leaves, plus sprigs for garnish
Coconut water, frozen in ice cube tray (approximately 1/2 tray)
title: Vanilla Bean Coconut Yogurt Smoothie

instructions:
To cut mango into pieces, stand it on end and slice the flesh off both sides of the central pit. Lay each half on a cutting board and with the tip of your knife, score the flesh in a cross-hatch pattern. Pushing from the skin side, turn inside out so that the mango flesh pops up; slice it off the skin. Also cut off the remaining flesh from around the pit and remove the skin.
In a blender, puree the fruit and ginger, scraping down the sides as necessary. Add the buttermilk, yogurt and ice and puree until smooth and frothy. Pour into glasses.
ingredients: 2 ripe mangoes (about 3/4 pound each) or 1 mango and 1 banana
title: Mango-Ginger Smoothie

instructions: Combine the ice, almond milk, coconut water, walnuts, dates and banana in the blender and blend on high speed until smooth. Pour into glasses and serve.
ingredients: 2 dried dates, pitted and coarsely chopped
title: Banana and Walnut Smoothie

instructions: Peel bananas, slice and place on a cookie sheet. Put in freezer and freeze until solid. Remove from freezer and place in blender. Slice berries and add to blender. Pour in yogurt. Blend until smooth. Pour into glass and serve.
title: Banana Berry Smoothie

instructions: Put the frozen cranberries, ice cubes, yogurt, orange juice and maple syrup into a blender. Blend on high until smooth, turning off the blender and pushing down on the ingredients with a spatula or wooden spoon as needed to help the blending process. Add 1 to 2 tablespoons of cold water if needed to adjust consistency. Pour into a glass and sprinkle with the wheat germ. Garnish with the sliced cranberry. Stir well before serving.
ingredients: 1/2 cup frozen cranberries, plus one thinly sliced cranberry for garnish
title: Cran-Sicle Smoothie

instructions:
Place the oats and milk in a medium saucepan over medium-high heat and bring to a rapid simmer. Reduce the heat to medium-low and cook, stirring constantly, until the oatmeal is thick, about 10 minutes. Add sugar, to taste, and set the oatmeal aside to cool slightly.
Transfer the oatmeal to a container and refrigerate it for at least 2 hours or overnight. Strain the liquid, add the vanilla and add more milk if you want it thinner. Serve cold.
ingredients: 6 cups milk, plus more if needed
title: Old-fashioned Avena Oatmeal Breakfast Smoothies

instructions:
Place the chia seeds in a cup or jar, add 1/2 cup of the almond milk and stir thoroughly to combine. Set the mixture aside for 10 minutes, or refrigerate overnight or up to 4 days.
Transfer the mixture to a blender. Add the blueberries, vanilla, coconut butter and cinnamon, and blend until smooth, adding honey to taste.
ingredients: 1 heaping tablespoon coconut butter or coconut oil
title: Blueberry and Chia Seed Smoothie

instructions:
Add the cucumber, kale, grapes, ice, parsley, lemon juice and apples to the carafe of a powerful blender. Blend on high until everything is homogeneous and smooth, adding 1 to 2 cups water as needed.
Pour into glasses and serve immediately.
ingredients: 1 cup peeled and coarsely chopped cucumber
1/2 cup to 1 cup green grapes, frozen
1/2 green apple, cored and coarsely chopped
title: Green Smoothie

instructions: Puree 1 cup vanilla yogurt, 1 cup frozen strawberries, 1 frozen banana and 1/4 cup orange juice in a blender until smooth.
title: Fruit Smoothie

instructions:
Stir the oats and water together in a small bowl and let sit for 5 minutes.
Put the oat mixture, peaches, ice cubes, yogurt, honey and cinnamon into a blender. Blend on high until very smooth. Add 1 to 2 tablespoons of water if needed to adjust consistency. Pour into a glass and garnish with a peach wedge.
ingredients: 2 small, ripe yellow peaches, peeled, pitted and roughly chopped, plus one wedge reserved for garnish
title: Peachy Oat Smoothie

instructions: Put the blueberries, almonds and honey into a blender. Blend on high until the mixture is mostly smooth, about 1 minute. Add the ice cubes and almond milk and blend until very smooth. Add 1 to 2 tablespoons of cold water if needed to adjust consistency. Pour into a glass and garnish with a short skewer of blueberries.
ingredients: 1 cup blueberries, plus more for garnish
title: Blueberry-Almond Smoothie

instructions:
Puree the peaches, cottage cheese, milk, honey, lemon juice, a pinch of salt, the nutmeg and 2 cups ice in a blender until smooth, 2 to 3 minutes. Divide among glasses and sprinkle with more nutmeg.
Photograph by Andrew Mccaul
ingredients: 2 ripe peaches, halved, pitted and cut into chunks (with skins)
Pinch of freshly grated nutmeg, plus more for sprinkling
title: Peachy-Keen Smoothies

instructions:
Combine all ingredients in a blender and puree until smooth, about 2 to 3 minutes. Drink immediately.
Aloha!
ingredients: 1 mango, skin removed, cut into 1-inch dice, frozen
5 strawberries, stems removed, cut half, frozen
title: Mango, Strawberry, and Pineapple Smoothie

instructions:
Watch how to make this recipe.
Put all the ingredients in a blender and process until smooth. Pour into glasses and serve.
Cooks note: For non-dairy smoothies, substitute 1 cup rice milk for the milk and yogurt. Or, use soy yogurt or milk instead of dairy.
ingredients: 2 cups frozen strawberries, raspberries, or cherries
2 to 3 tablespoons honey or to taste
title: Frozen Fruit Smoothies

instructions: Place banana, kiwi, ice, and apple cider in a blender and blend until smooth. Add green food coloring to desired greenness.
title: "Slime Smoothie"

instructions:
Watch how to make this recipe.
In a blender, combine all ingredients but the ice and mint. Process until blended. Gradually add enough ice to make a thick consistency. Pour mixture into tall glasses and serve. Garnish with fresh mint, if desired.
title: Chai Tea Smoothies

instructions: Puree ingredients in a blender and enjoy!
title: Carrot-Ginger Smoothie

instructions:
For the mango-peach smoothie: Add the mangoes, peaches, nectar and yogurt to a blender and blend until smooth. Add lime juice and honey to taste if needed. Pour into a pitcher and refrigerate until very cold.
For the strawberry-banana smoothie: Combine the strawberries and sugar in a bowl and let macerate for 30 minutes in the refrigerator. Add the macerated strawberries and some of the juices, the frozen banana and yogurt to a blender and blend until smooth. Add lemon juice to taste if needed. Pour into a pitcher and refrigerate until very cold.
Fill each glass half way with the mango-peach and then fill to the top with the strawberry-banana. Mix together the finely diced mango, peach and strawberries in a small bowl and top each glass with some of the fruit for garnish.
ingredients: 2 very ripe mangoes, peeled, pitted and diced
2 very ripe peaches, peeled, pitted and diced
2 pints ripe strawberries, hulled and halved
Finely diced mango and peach, for garnish
title: Layered Smoothies

instructions: Place the apple juice, blackberries, raspberries, ice cream, strawberries, and ice in the blender. Blend on high until smooth. Pour into 2 tall frosted glasses. Enjoy on an outdoor patio.
ingredients: 2 cups ice cubes (small ones work best)
title: Honey Hut's Triple Berry Blast Smoothie

instructions:
Place half the raspberries in a blender with half the ice cream, 1 tablespoon almond liqueur, and 1 teaspoon orange zest. Pulse the blender until the mixture is combined. Add about half a tray of ice and blend until smooth.
Divide the smoothie between 2 highball glasses and continue making the other 2 smoothies with the remaining ingredients. Crumble the macaroon cookies over the top of the smoothies. Serve with long spoons and a straw.
ingredients: 12 ounces fresh raspberries (or 12-ounces frozen raspberries, thawed), divided
1 quart vanilla gelato (or ice cream), lightly softened, divided
title: Amaretto and Raspberry Smoothie

instructions:
Watch how to make this recipe.
Combine the fruit, orange juice, kefir, yogurt, flax seeds and ice cubes in a blender and mix for 20 to 30 seconds. Stop the blender, remove the top and add the kale. Mix for another minute until blended and smooth. Serve immediately.
ingredients: 1 cup pineapple, peeled and chopped into large chunks
title: Guy's Rockin' Smoothie

instructions: Combine the yogurt and nectar in a blender. Add the raspberries and peaches. Blend until smooth.;
title: Peachy Keen Smoothies

instructions:
Watch how to make this recipe.
Put all ingredients into a blender and blend until smooth.
ingredients: 1/2 cup nonfat or 1 percent lowfat milk
title: Blueberry Blast Smoothie

instructions: PLACE frozen mango in bottom of blender. Add preserves and orange juice. Process until blended and smooth.
ingredients: 1/4 cup Smucker's® Orchard's Finest® Pacific Mountain Strawberry Preserves
title: Strawberry Mango Smoothie

instructions:
Watch how to make this recipe.
Special equipment: ice-pop molds
Add the yogurt, frozen berries, honey, banana and cabbage to a blender. Then pour in the juice and blend until smooth!
Pour into ice-pop molds and stash them in the freezer until totally frozen. Remove and eat as required!
ingredients: 2 cups frozen mixed berries (or frozen strawberries)
1 cup cranberry or grape juice (or any deep red/purple juice)
title: Purple Smoothie Pops

instructions:
1.Place all ingredients into the Vitamix container in the order listed and secure lid.
2.Select Variable 1.
3.Turn machine on and slowly increase speed to Variable 10, then to High.
4.Blend for 30-45 seconds, or until desired consistency is reached. Serve immediately.
ingredients: ½ cup (122 g) low fat vanilla yogurt
½ cup (48 g) cranberries, fresh or frozen
title: Passionately Pink Smoothie

instructions: Put the coconut water spinach and pineapple in a blender and whirl until smooth. Serve.
title: Healthy Green Smoothie

instructions: In the pitcher of a blender add the papaya, almond milk, honey, lemon juice and ice cubes, and blend until smooth. Pour into glasses and serve.
title: Papaya-Almond Milk Stressbuster Smoothie

instructions:
Pour the carrot juice into an ice cube tray and freeze until solid, at least 2 hours.
Put the pineapple, buttermilk, dates, carrot juice ice cubes and cinnamon into a blender. Blend on high until smooth, turning off the blender and pushing down on the ingredients with a spatula or wooden spoon as needed to help the blending process. Add 1 to 2 tablespoons of cold water if needed to adjust consistency.
ingredients: 1/2 cup packed fresh chopped pineapple (about 4 ounces)
title: Carrot-Pineapple Smoothie

instructions: In a blender combine half of each ingredient, including: mango, bananas, strawberries, carrots, ice cubes, honey and yogurt and blend until smooth. Pour into a glass and serve immediately. Repeat process for remaining ingredients.
title: Mega-Smoothie

instructions:
Watch how to make this recipe.
Put half of the ice into a blender. Add half of the soy milk, the cereal, seeds, raisins and dates. Blend until smooth. Add the remaining ice, honey and soy milk. Blend again until the mixture is creamy and smooth. Serve in a glass with a straw.
ingredients: 2 tablespoons mixed cereal, such as wheat flakes or oats
1 tablespoon mixed seeds, such as sunflower or pumpkin
title: Breakfast Smoothie

instructions: In a blender, combine strawberries, blueberries, banana, and pineapple until smooth. Add tofu and ice cubes and liquefy. Serve immediately.
title: Tutti Frutti Smoothie

instructions:
1.Place all ingredients into the Vitamix container in the order listed and secure lid.
2.Select Variable 1.
3.Turn machine on and slowly increase speed to Variable 10, then to High.
4.Blend for 35-40 seconds or until mixture is smooth.
ingredients: ¼ (53 g) Bartlett pear, ripe, seeded and halved
¼ cup (23 g) coarsely chopped broccoli
title: All Green Smoothie

instructions: Blend the kiwi, ginger, coconut milk, hemp seeds, parsley and agave nectar and 1/2 cup ice in a blender on high speed until light and frothy, about 3 minutes. Pour into a tall glass and serve immediately.
ingredients: 1-inch piece fresh ginger, peeled and sliced
1/4 cup raw shelled hemp seeds, such as Hemp Hearts
title: Kiwi-Ginger Zinger Protein Smoothie

instructions:
Watch how to make this recipe.
Fill ice trays with the coconut water and freeze until solid.
Place the fruit, honey and 12 to 14 coconut water flavored ice cubes into a blender and blend until smooth. Serve immediately.
title: Coconut Water Smoothie with Mango, Banana and Strawberries

instructions: Blend 2 cups chopped honeydew melon, 1 cup each almond milk and ice, and honey to taste.
title: Honeydew-Almond Smoothie

instructions: Combine all ingredients in a blender. Blend until smooth. Divide among glasses.
ingredients: 1-ounce sugar-free, fat-free vanilla pudding mix (recommended: Jell-o)
1 (4-ounce) orange cream yogurt (recommended: Yoplait Orange Creme)
title: Spiked Orange Smoothie

instructions:
Watch how to make this recipe.
Place all the ingredients in a blender. Blend, pulsing the machine if necessary, until smooth. Make sure the honey is dissolved. Serve immediately.
ingredients: 2 cups soy milk or skim milk
1 tablespoon honey, plus more to taste
title: Tropical Fruit Smoothie

instructions:
Special equipment: Blender 4 glasses
Peel and wrap the banana tightly in plastic wrap. Put it in the freezer for 2 hours. Place the yogurt, strawberries, banana, and orange juice in the jar of a blender. Puree until smooth and frothy. Serve.
title: Fruit Smoothie

instructions: In a small blender, add (in this order) the peanut butter, jam, protein powder, ice and almond milk. Blend until thick and smooth. Serve immediately.
ingredients: 2 tablespoons protein powder, strawberry or vanilla flavor
title: Peanut Butter and Jelly Smoothie

instructions:
The night before, pour an 11.8-ounce can coconut water into an ice cube tray; freeze until solid. To serve, blend 2 cups chopped fresh pineapple, 2 cups 2% Greek yogurt, 1 cup coconut sorbet, 1/2 cup unsweetened coconut milk, 3/4 cup coconut water, 1/4 cup shaved fresh coconut and 6 coconut ice cubes in a blender until smooth. Thin with more coconut water or coconut milk, if desired. Divide among 4 glasses.
Photograph by Andrew Mccaul
title: Coconut Smoothies

instructions: In a blender, combine the pineapple chunks, coconut milk, banana, ice and, if desired, honey. Puree until smooth. Pour into 2 large glasses. Garnish each serving with a pineapple wedge.
title: Pina Colada Smoothie

instructions:
Watch how to make this recipe.
Heat the milk in small saucepan set over medium heat. Add the chocolate chips and whisk until the chips melt and the mixture is smooth, about 5 minutes. Remove from the heat and cool for about 5 minutes. Pour the cooled chocolate mixture into a blender. Add 1 cup of the raspberries, the yogurt, almonds and ice cubes, and blend until smooth. Pour into glasses, garnish with the remaining 1/4 cup raspberries and serve.
title: Chocolate Stressbuster Smoothie

instructions: Add the ice to the blender pitcher. Combine the Kefir, pineapple, and honey in a bowl and then add to the blender. Blend until smooth. Pour into glasses and serve.
ingredients: 1/2 cup kefir (cultured milk product available in specialty health food stores)
title: Pineapple Mama Smoothie

instructions: Add the coconut milk, soaked chia seeds, cinnamon, spinach, banana and acai berry pulp to the pitcher of a high-speed blender and process until thick and creamy. The texture should be very thick; if too thick, then add more coconut milk. If you stick a spoon into the mixture, the mixture should be able to be thick enough to stay on the spoon; if not, add ice or more frozen bananas.
ingredients: 1/2 cup unsweetened coconut milk, plus more if needed
2 tablespoons chia seeds, soaked for at least 20 minutes in some of the coconut milk
One 100-gram packet frozen organic acai berry pulp
title: Acai Berry Smoothie Bowl

instructions: Put everything in a blender and puree until smooth. Divide between 2 vacuum-sealed containers.
ingredients: 1 cup frozen berries, such as strawberries, raspberries, or blackberries (about 6 ounces)
1/2 cup or 1 (6-ounce) container plain, vanilla, or lemon lowfat yogurt
3/4 cup orange juice or apple juice
1 to 2 tablespoons honey, or to taste
title: Berry-nana Smoothie

instructions: Put the berries, 1/2 cup cold water, beet, lemon juice, honey and coconut oil into a blender. Blend on high until smooth, turning off the blender and pushing down on the ingredients with a spatula or wooden spoon as needed to help the blending process. Add 1 to 2 tablespoons more water if needed to adjust consistency.
ingredients: 2 cups mixed frozen red berries such as strawberries and raspberries
1 small red beet, peeled and thinly sliced
title: Red Berry-and-Beet Smoothie

instructions: Place the pomegranate juice, blueberries, yogurt, honey and ice in a blender. Turn on high and blend until smooth. Serve in a reusable to-go cup.;
title: Blueberry Pomegranate Smoothie

instructions: Add the spinach, grapes, tea, kiwi, mint and apples to the bowl of a blender. Blend until smooth, adding water if needed to get the desired consistency. Drink with a straw.
ingredients: 1 medium ripe kiwi, peeled and chopped
1/2 Granny Smith apple, cored and chopped
title: Mean Green Smoothie

instructions:
Watch how to make this recipe.
Combine the milk, pumpkin puree, yogurt, maple syrup, pie spice, vanilla and banana in a blender and blend until combined.
ingredients: 1/4 teaspoon pumpkin pie spice or cinnamon
title: Pumpkin Smoothie

instructions:
For the blue layer: Pour the pomegranate juice into the blender. Add the bananas, blueberries, ice and honey and blend until smooth. Pour into the bottoms of four 8-ounce glasses and tap the glasses on the countertop to help even the layer. Freeze while preparing the next layer.
For the white layer: Rinse out the blender and pour in the orange juice. Add the ice, yogurt and bananas and blend until smooth. Pour the white layer on top of the blue layer in the glasses, again tapping the glasses on the countertop, and then return to the freezer.
For the red layer: Rinse the blender once more and pour in the pomegranate juice. Add the strawberries, bananas and ice and blend until smooth. Pour the red layer on top of the white layer. Keep in the freezer until ready to serve.
ingredients: 2 ounces orange juice (or the juice from 1 orange)
title: Red, White and Blue Smoothie

instructions:
Watch how to make this recipe.
Pour the coconut milk into a clean ice cube tray (it will not fill the entire tray) and freeze at least 4 hours or up to overnight.
Add the coconut milk cubes, strawberries, pineapples, pineapple juice and flax seeds to a blender and puree until smooth. Pour into glasses and serve.
ingredients: 1 cup fresh or canned pineapple chunks
title: Gluten-Free Coconut Pineapple Strawberry Smoothies

instructions: Place everything in a blender and puree until smooth.
title: Blueberry Power Smoothie

instructions:
Watch how to make this recipe.
Special equipment: a plastic straw and two 16-ounce (or four 8-ounce) Mason jars, optional
Using the plastic straw, remove the white bitter interior and stem of each strawberry. You do this by centering the straw on the bottom pointed end of the fruit, pushing up through the inside to the top and popping off the stem in one smooth motion. Staying centered on the fruit with the straw is the key to quickly hulling and removing the bitter core of strawberries. (You can alternatively cut the stems and white bitter flesh out with a knife.)
In a blender, combine the strawberries, blueberries, coconut water and strawberry yogurt and cover with the lid. Press the setting for puree and let it run until the texture is nice and smooth, at least 30 seconds.
Pour into two 16-ounce Mason jars (or glasses), or four 8-ounce jars. Garnish with granola and mint leaves.
title: Strawberry and Farm Fresh Blueberry Smoothie

instructions:
Watch how to make this recipe.
Anytime before Thanksgiving, spoon the pumpkin pie filling into muffin cups, then cover the pan with aluminum foil and place it in the freezer.
When you're ready to make the smoothies, add the milk to a blender. Then add the yogurt. Pop 4 pieces of the frozen pumpkin pie filling out of the pan and add to the blender. (Save the rest of the pie filling for another time, or for a second batch of smoothies if one isn't enough to calm the hungry beasts.)
Next, add the cinnamon. Then blend the mixture until totally smooth and pour it into individual glasses.
Sprinkle the tops with graham cracker crumbs before serving.
title: Pumpkin Smoothie

instructions: Combine the almond milk, kale, powdered peanut butter, protein powder, banana and ice in a blender and blend until smooth. Serve immediately.
ingredients: 2 tablespoons powdered peanut butter, such as PB2
title: Power Smoothie

instructions:
Stir the chia seeds and coconut milk together in a small bowl. Allow to sit for 30 minutes so that the chia seeds plump slightly.
Put the mango, 2 tablespoons cold water, honey if using, lime juice and ice cubes into a blender. Blend on high until very smooth. Add the chia seed and coconut milk mixture and pulse until just combined; avoid blending the chia seeds too much. Add 1 to 2 tablespoons of cold water if needed to adjust consistency.
ingredients: 1/2 cup chopped peeled ripe mango (about 1/4 mango)
title: Mango, Coconut and Chia Smoothie

instructions: Put the pineapple, kale, frozen grapes, lemon juice, ginger and flaxseed into a blender. Blend on high until very smooth, turning off the blender and pushing down on the ingredients with a spatula or wooden spoon as needed to help the blending process. Add 1 to 2 tablespoons of water if needed to adjust consistency. Pour into a glass and garnish with a pineapple wedge.
ingredients: 1 cup chopped fresh pineapple, plus a pineapple wedge for garnish
title: Green Smoothie

instructions:
Watch how to make this recipe.
Add the milk, coffee, peanut butter, coconut oil, honey, vanilla and bananas to a blender and puree until smooth. Serve immediately.
ingredients: 2 frozen peeled ripe bananas, cut into 1-inch chunks
title: Complete Breakfast Smoothie

instructions: Place banana, Juicy Juice®, Carnation® Breakfast Essentials™ Drink, yogurt and strawberries in blender; cover. Blend until smooth. Divide shake between 2 chilled glasses and serve immediately.
ingredients: 1 cup Berry Flavor Nestle® Juicy Juice® All Natural 100% Juice, chilled
1 packet Classic French Vanilla Flavor Carnation® Breakfast Essentials™ Complete Nutritional Drink
½ cup vanilla or berry-flavored lowfat yogurt
½ cup fresh or frozen strawberries or other berries
title: Berry Banana Breakfast Smoothie (Sponsored)

instructions:
Make the Smoothie: Combine all the ingredients in a blender and pulse to chop everything up. Flip the switch to high and blend until smooth.
Pour the smoothie among 4 glasses, and garnish each with a strawberry and mint sprig.
ingredients: 1 cup frozen strawberries (don't defrost, if using fresh berries, freeze them first)
1/2 cup heavy cream (to lighten up, substitute water)
1/2 teaspoon vanilla extract (there should be no sugar in the ingredient list--usually artificial types are best)
title: Strawberry and Tofu Smoothie

instructions: In a blender, add yogurt, ice, milk and chocolate syrup. Puree until smooth. Moisten the rims of each glass and press into crushed candy cane. Drizzle chocolate syrup in each glass then pour in smoothie.
ingredients: 3 tablespoons chocolate syrup, plus extra for glass
title: Chocoholic Smoothie with Peppermint Rim

instructions: Place all ingredients in a blender and blend until smooth. Pour into glasses.
ingredients: 1 1/2 cups seeded and chopped honeydew melon
title: Melon Smoothies

instructions: Blend the milk, sweetened condensed milk and ice in a blender until very smooth. Add the avocado flesh and blend again until smooth. The mixture will be quite thick; add cold water a few tablespoons at a time, blending after each addition, until the mixture is pourable. Taste and add more sweetened condensed milk if you want it sweeter. Serve in chilled glasses with straws.
ingredients: 1/2 cup sweetened condensed milk, plus more to taste
title: Ultra-Creamy Avocado Smoothie

instructions:
For the blue layer: Pour the pomegranate juice into the blender. Add the bananas, blueberries, ice and honey and blend until smooth. Pour into the bottoms of four 8-ounce glasses and tap the glasses on the countertop to help even the layer. Freeze while preparing the next layer.
For the white layer: Rinse out the blender and pour in the orange juice. Add the ice, yogurt and bananas and blend until smooth. Pour the white layer on top of the blue layer in the glasses, again tapping the glasses on the countertop, and then return to the freezer.
For the red layer: Rinse the blender once more and pour in the pomegranate juice. Add the strawberries, bananas and ice and blend until smooth. Pour the red layer on top of the white layer. Keep in the freezer until ready to serve.
ingredients: 2 ounces orange juice (or the juice from 1 orange)
title: Red, White and Blue Smoothie

instructions:
Add to blender: 1 cup strawberries, 1 banana, 1 cup nonfat plain yogurt, 1 cup orange juice, 1 cup of ice and 2 tablespoons plus 1 teaspoon Truvia® natural sweetener spoonable.* Blend on high until smooth.
*or 8 packets Truvia® natural sweetener
title: Fresh Strawberry Banana Sunrise Smoothie

instructions: Pour ingredients into a blender and blend until smooth.;
title: Banana Orange Smoothie

instructions: Combine the almond milk, yogurt and ice in a blender. Choose your smoothie color and add the ingredients for that color to the blender. Blend on low speed at first, then switch to high speed and blend until completely smooth. Serve immediately.
title: Rainbow Smoothie

instructions: Place all ingredients in a blender and puree until smooth. Pour into individual glasses and drizzle honey on top of each milkshake to finish.
ingredients: 1 tablespoon honey, plus more for garnish
title: Lowfat Green Tea, Honey and Nutmeg Smoothies

instructions:
For the Raspberry-Blueberry Smoothie: Put raspberries, blueberries, soy milk and yogurt into blender. Add ice cubes. Blend until smooth.
For the Kiwi-Apple Smoothie: Put kiwis, apple juice, soy milk and yogurt into blender. Add ice cubes. Blend until smooth
For the Sunny Day Banana-Pineapple Smoothie: Put bananas, pineapple juice, vanilla soy milk and yogurt into blender. Add ice cubes. Blend until smooth.
title: Smoothies

instructions: In a blender, combine all the ingredients. Blend for about 1 minute. Pour into a large glass and serve.
ingredients: 1 teaspoon protein powder or other powdered vitamin supplement, optional
title: It's Elvis, Baby! Smoothie

instructions:
Combine the papaya, banana, strawberries and about 15 ice cubes in a blender and puree until smooth. Pour into 2-ounce shot glasses and garnish with pineapple and/or cherries.
Photograph by Levi Brown
ingredients: 1 small papaya, peeled, seeded and diced
Pineapple wedges and/or maraschino cherries, for garnish
title: Papaya Smoothies

instructions: Drain and rinse the cashews. Blend them with the mango, banana, orange juice, coconut water, turmeric, ginger if using, honey and vanilla in a blender on high speed until completely smooth and creamy. (Add more coconut water if you prefer a thinner consistency.)
ingredients: 1/2 cup raw cashews, soaked in a cup of water for 4 to 6 hours
1/2 cup coconut water or water, plus more if needed for desired consistency
2 teaspoons peeled and chopped fresh turmeric
1 teaspoon peeled and chopped fresh ginger, optional
title: Mango Smoothie with Turmeric

instructions: Place the berries, coconut milk and honey or sugar in a blender or food processor and puree until smooth. Chill and serve garnished with whole berries.;
ingredients: 1/4 cup honey or sugar (or to taste)
title: Berry Berry Smoothie

instructions: Combine the banana, coconut, date, cinnamon, nutmeg and coconut water in a blender and puree until smooth, adding more liquid if necessary. Pour into a glass and sprinkle with cinnamon.
ingredients: 1/2 teaspoon ground cinnamon, plus more for sprinkling
title: Banana-Coconut Pudding Smoothie

instructions:
Special equipment: a high-powered blender, optional
In a carafe of a high-powered blender, combine the avocado, banana, blueberries, coconut water, collard greens, pineapple, lime juice and ginger. Blend until thick and creamy.
ingredients: 1 frozen peeled banana, cut into 2-inch chunks
title: Blueberry Smoothie

instructions:
Watch how to make this recipe.
In a blender, combine the mango, papaya, banana, orange juice, milk, yogurt, honey, and ice. Blend until smooth.
title: Tropical Smoothie

instructions:
Watch how to make this recipe.
Combine the kale, grapes, orange juice, pear, banana and 1/2 cup water in a blender with ice and blend until smooth.
title: Katie's Kale Smoothie

instructions: Pour ingredients into a blender and blend until smooth.;
title: Banana Orange Smoothie

instructions:
Watch how to make this recipe.
Place the milk and oats in a blender and blend for 15 seconds on high. Add the peaches, ice, spinach, honey, vanilla and bananas and blend until very smooth, 45 seconds. Serve in glasses.
ingredients: 2 cups vanilla almond, coconut or soy milk
1 1/4 cups fresh, frozen or canned peaches, or mango cubes
title: Green Morning Smoothie

instructions: Add all the ingredients to a blender and pulse until smooth.
title: Big Berry Smoothie

instructions: Pass the celery, apple and pineapple through a juicer. Transfer the juice to a blender and add the banana, orange juice, honey, ice, and vitamins. Blend the mixture until smooth.
title: Celery-Pineapple Smoothie

instructions:
Watch how to make this recipe.
In a small saucepan, bring the sugar and water to a boil over medium-high heat. Simmer, stirring occasionally, until the sugar has dissolved, about 5 minutes. Cool for 20 minutes.
Pour the cooled syrup into a blender. Add the yogurt, raspberries, apple juice, vanilla, and ice. Blend until the mixture is smooth and thick.
Pour into glasses and serve.
title: Raspberry-Vanilla Smoothie

instructions:
Watch how to make this recipe.
In a blender, combine the yogurt, basil, Lemon Simple Syrup, and ice. Blend until smooth and frothy. Pour into frosted glasses and serve immediately.
In a small saucepan, combine the water, sugar, and lemon zest over medium heat. Bring to a boil, reduce the heat and simmer for 5 minutes, stirring occasionally, until the sugar has dissolved. Take the pan off the heat and allow the syrup to cool, about 20 minutes. Strain before using.
ingredients: 1 1/2 cups Lemon Simple Syrup, recipe follows
title: Sweet Basil Smoothie

instructions: Place the strawberries, watermelon, peach, sorbet, and orange juice in a blender and puree until smooth and creamy. Add more orange juice if you'd like it a little less thick. Serve immediately in tall glasses with straws.
ingredients: 1 cup chopped ripe strawberries (5 large strawberries)
title: Sunrise Smoothie

instructions: In a blender process the mango, pineapple juice, strawberries and coconut sorbet until smooth. Serve in a tall glass and garnish with strawberry.
ingredients: 2 scoops coconut sorbet or strawberry sorbet
title: Mango Pineapple Strawberry Smoothie

instructions: Preheat a grill to high heat (400 degrees F). To grill the watermelon, first sprinkle with the sugar and salt. Grill quickly, cooking each side for 2 minutes and flipping with a wide spatula. Once the watermelon is cooked, remove from the grill and add to a blender, along with the yogurt, apple juice, ice, honey and vanilla. Puree until smooth, 1 to 2 minutes. Finally, add the mint and basil leaves, pulse 5 to 6 times and serve. Garnish with watermelon wedges and mint.
ingredients: 1 seedless watermelon plank (2 inches thick, 10 inches long and 6 inches wide)
12 fresh mint leaves, plus more julienned for garnish
title: Grilled Watermelon Basil Mint Smoothie

instructions:
Special equipment: Martini glasses
In a blender combine sliced bananas, sliced strawberries, yogurt and juices. Pour into martini glasses and top with whipped cream and Orange Sesame-Seed Tuilles for garnish.
title: Orange Black Sesame Tuilles Smoothie Martini

instructions:
Watch how to make this recipe.
In a blender, add the banana chunks, blueberries, strawberries, and mango. Blend until combined, about 30 seconds. Serve in chilled glasses with straws.
ingredients: 1/2 medium banana, peeled and cut into chunks
2 cups chilled unsweetened vanilla-flavored almond milk
title: Almond Milk and Berry Smoothie

instructions: Add the coconut milk, soaked chia seeds, cinnamon, spinach, banana and acai berry pulp to the pitcher of a high-speed blender and process until thick and creamy. The texture should be very thick; if too thick, then add more coconut milk. If you stick a spoon into the mixture, the mixture should be able to be thick enough to stay on the spoon; if not, add ice or more frozen bananas.
ingredients: 1/2 cup unsweetened coconut milk, plus more if needed
2 tablespoons chia seeds, soaked for at least 20 minutes in some of the coconut milk
One 100-gram packet frozen organic acai berry pulp
title: Acai Berry Smoothie Bowl

instructions: In a blender combine the fruit with the sugar, the chosen flavoring and enough of the chosen liquid to barely cover the fruit. Blend until smooth. Taste to adjust seasoning. Garnish with a strawberry and a sprig of mint.;
title: Ruthie's Frozen Fruit Smoothie

instructions: Combine the orange juice, carrot juice, ice, banana and mango in a blender and blend until smooth. Pour into 2 glasses and serve.;
ingredients: 1 large ripe mango, peeled, pitted and chopped
title: Carrot Mango Smoothie

instructions: Place all ingredients in a blender and blend until frothy. Pour into 2 glasses and serve immediately.
title: Papaya Smoothie

instructions:
Fill ice trays with the coconut water and freeze until solid.
Place the fruit, honey and 12 to 14 coconut water-flavored ice cubes into a blender and blend until smooth. Serve immediately.
title: Coconut Water Smoothie
